abilities.name: Sludge Cell
abilities.text: If Muk remains affected by any Special Conditions between turns, remove 2 damage counters from Muk.

attacks.name: Strange Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If tails, Muk is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Strange Sludge
attacks.text: If Muk is Poisoned, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
